attributes.action: withdraw all funding from religious schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Religion is divisive.  Whereas all should have the right to sponsor institutions of whatever type from their own funds, public money should not be used to support them.

government_responses.details:
